I'm Russell.
I build beautiful, fast, responsive websites that make users smile.

More about me

I'm a front end developer based in Brooklyn, New York with over 20 years of experience. HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript are my tools of choice.

  • Here's a selection of my recent work.
  • You can contact me in all sorts of ways.
  • I also have a blog I write that may interest other front end developers.

About this site

My calling card is this site. It's fast and responsive and uses no external libraries that would potentially slow things down. It's also powered by Jekyll and uses a slightly customized version of my basic theme available for use in other projects.

Process

I'm comfortable creating code from both wireframes and design comps. I work equally well as part of a larger team, something I do frequently with companies like Isobar, and small agencies such as Monaco Lange and Frank Collective.

I'm currently available for both long and short term projects.
